education.institution: International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad

work.name: National University of Singapore
work.summary: Explored the performance and distributed inference of LLMs on single-board computers for wireless sensing applications.
highlights: Analyzed LLMs for sensor datasheet interpretation.
Explored distributed inference across multiple devices.

work.name: Walmart Global Tech India
work.summary: Built a RetinaNet-based object detection system for retail applications, focusing on recognizing and identifying retail items with high accuracy.
highlights: Developed a retail object detection system using Vision Transformer and FAISS.
Successfully recognized 30+ retail objects from single images with ≥95% accuracy.
Contributed to enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of item recognition in a retail environment.

work.name: Signal Processing and Communications Research Centre, IIIT-H
work.summary: Worked on developing low-cost remote labs for educational purposes and performed security analysis on large-scale IoT deployments.
highlights: Led a team of 5 research students and 15 interns.
Developed RLabs, a platform used by over 300 students for remote learning.

volunteer.summary: Volunteered to educate underprivileged students in rural India.
highlights: Taught basic science and mathematics to students from rural areas.
